Detailed Description

A callback to be invoked when a widget is clicked. 

 class MyClickListener : public gaia::core::OnClickListener {
   public:
     MyClickListener(gaia::core::Page* page);

     void onClick(gaia::core::Widget* w) {
         // handle the event here ...
     }
     ...
 };

 void MyPage::onInit(Persistence* const p) {
     mpBtnListener = new MyOnClickListener(this);
     mpBtn = new Button(this);
     mpBtn->setOnClickListener(mpBtnListener);
     ...   
 }

Member Function Documentation

virtual void gaia::core::OnClickListener::onClick ( Widget *  w) [virtual]

Called when a touch event is dispatched to a widget.

This allows listeners to get a chance to respond before the target widget.

Parameters:
wThe widget the touch event has been dispatched to.
